column2: Therefore  taking  into  consideration  the  entirety  of the  submissions
raised by the Respondents, and conclude that this is not a fit  and proper case

column1: to invoke the discretionary revisionary powers of this Court.

column2: Accordingly the  interim relief sought for  is  refused  and  I dismiss  the

column3: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
